text: Oboro (oh-BOH-roh; Japanese: 朧 宮 ; rōmaji : Oboro-gū ; literally: "Hazy Palace"; Kamigawan: lit. "occluded" or "misty moon" ) is the main cloud palace of the Soratami , located in the city of Otawara . Formerly the exclusive domain of the moonfolk, the floating city of Otawara has opened its doors to intrepid researchers of all kinds. The only place non-moonfolk are still forbidden is Oboro, which is considered sacred ground to the moonfolk. Associated cards:
